name: DeFi and Other Bitcoin Treasuries Fetcher
description: Fetches and analyzes data on DeFi and other entities holding Bitcoin treasuries from bitcointreasuries.net, saves historical data to CSVs, and generates plots.
author: @@official.shinkai

folder_path.description: Path to the folder where data and plot files will be saved.

show_full_list.description: If true, returns the full list of entities with BTC holdings; otherwise, returns only the top 10. Default: False, shows only top 10.

defi_and_other_entities_with_BTC_holding.description: Full list of entities with BTC holdings (returned if show_full_list is true).

btc_holdings_value_in_USD.description: Formatted USD value of BTC holdings.

percentage_of_total_supply.description: Formatted percentage of total BTC supply.

rank.description: Rank of the entity by BTC holdings.

overview_of_defi_and_other_entities_with.description: Summary overview of DeFi and other entities' BTC treasuries.

count.description: Formatted count of entities with BTC holdings.

total_btc.description: Formatted total BTC held by all entities.

total_supply_percentage.description: Formatted percentage of total BTC supply held.

total_usd_value.description: Formatted total USD value of BTC holdings.

saved_files.description: List of paths to saved files including CSV histories and PNG plots.

top_10_defi_and_other_entities_with_BTC_.description: Top 10 entities with BTC holdings (returned if show_full_list is false).

btc_holdings_value_in_USD.description: Formatted USD value of BTC holdings.

percentage_of_total_supply.description: Formatted percentage of total BTC supply.

rank.description: Rank of the entity by BTC holdings.
